message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. Hope we can reach a deal quickly!
That's a very aggressive start, Alice! How about something more reasonable?  I'll take 70 and you get 30.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40.  I'm not sure how much longer we can keep going back and forth with this inflation!
It seems like we both want a larger slice of the pie! How about we meet in the middle? 60 for me, 40 for you.
